content.query:
DROP TABLE [Kiabi].[Sales]
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = '[Sales]' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE [Kiabi].[Sales]
	(
	 day_id varchar(30),
	 style_id varchar(30),
	 color_id varchar(30),
	 size_id varchar(30),
	 store_id varchar(30),
	 sales_channel_id varchar(30),
	 sales_unitlong float,
	 currency_id varchar(30),
	 sales_revenue float,
	 sales_revenue_vat float,
	 sales_cost float,
	 sales_markdowns_pos float,
	 returns_unit bigint,
	 returns_retail float,
	 returns_cost float,
	 type_evenement varchar(30),
	 date_integration bigint,
	 date_evenement bigint
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO
